price: 56. Kuna xus Kitaabka (Qur’aanka) Idriis. Wuxuu ahaa run badane Nabi ah.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ إِدۡرِيسَۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ صِدِّيقٗا نَّبِيّٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur fī al-kitābi id'rīsa innahu kāna ṣiddīqan nabiyyan
